name: Sweet Paradise: Explore Candy
description:
Sweet Paradise : Explore Candy is a sweet game genre match 3! In the game, you need to swap sweets to combine at least three of the same in a row. Collecting sweets next to obstacles, you destroy them and pass the level. In the candy land you will find a large number of levels, obstacles and bonuses! And also nice graphics, soundtrack and exciting levels-puzzles. At this point in the game more levels! And this is not the limit - new ones appear regularly!
Features:
- Train your brain
- Beautiful graphics and effects.
- Discover yummy candy COMBOS.
- Enjoy thousands of colorful LEVELS
- This awesome game is simple and easy to learn, perfect for both adults and kids to enjoy!
- Free to play and filled with adventure! Get it now!
